DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn make home supportive healthy eat physical activity . As part study , participant randomly assign one two group . One group receive material information healthy eating physical activity . The material mail 3 time 5 month period . The group work coach make home supportive healthy eat physical activity . Working coach involve 3 home visit 4 coach telephone call 5 month period . This group also receive material mail 4 different time . All participant ask complete 7 telephone interview 1 year period . Participants also ask wear accelerometer , small portable device track movement physical activity , 7 day 2 different point study .
DOC.criteria: Female 3565 year old BMI great equal 25 Speak English Must live least one person Live within 30 mile 1 9 clinic refer patient study Must contraindication physical activity Must contraindication participate medically unsupervised study 1 person per household
